appearances.title: CNN NewsNight With Abby Phillip : CNNW : January 13, 2026 12:00am-1:00am PST
appearances.snippet: i even saw steve daines today coming out saying that he wants the fed to stay independent, not for the president to do this. so i've seen it across the spectrum. but, you know, i think your point is well taken, abby, that i think one of the reasons donald trump was elected is because a lot of americans are uncomfortable with the warfare that they perceive the biden administration was pursuing. and now it seems the trump administration is doing the exact same thing against his political opponents. and i don't think that's what americans like. >> i will add, however, that it is incumbent on republicans in congress and congress generally to perform its oversight role. punditry does not does not suffice for oversight of this administration. >> statements that are basically like, well, you know, we would like the fed to be independent, period. it seems to not address. >> fascinating. matt, if i can, it's fascinating that the person who happened to be running against french hill is the chair of the oversight of the financial services committee, and what he said was more platitudes. hey, look
